verbose_text: Apixaban (Eliquis (R)) is a oral factor Xa inhibitor that impedes activity of factor Xa when free or bound to platelets, in a selective and reversible manner, and blocks activity of the prothrombinase complex.
evidence: Xa inhibitor that impedes activity of factor Xa when free or bound to platelets, in a selective and reversible manner, and blocks activity of the prothrombinase complex
